questions.question: What is the dominant color of the tote bag's exterior?

Describe the overall shape of the presented handbag.
What color are the tote bag's handles or straps?
What is the color of the zipper pulls on the tote bag?

Describe the position of the smaller inner pockets within the bag.
What is the apparent size of the zipper pulls, small or large?
Is the interior of the bag a contrasting color to the exterior?
